mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cartlist(id, no, orderCount) VALUES (#{id}, #{no}, #{orderCount})
mapper.select: SELECT c.idx, c.id, c.orderCount, c.date, p.no, p.smallcategory, p.imagepath, p.productname, p.registerid, p.price FROM productList p, cartlist c WHERE p.no = c.no AND c.id = #{id} ORDER BY c.date
